content.raw: I have just updated G.99 to Py3 \(and don’t have any RFBlasters in here at the moment anyway\), and G.96 is offline ready to be rebuilt when parts arrive, so should get a fresh Py3 update before things get going again in there too. I don’t think that we need to worry about Py2.7 compatibility for RFBlasters anymore.
